import React, { Component } from 'react' import mainService from '../services/main.service'; class GameComponent extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { gameId: JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("auth")).gameId, inviteLink: "http://localhost:3000/joingame/" + JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("auth")).gameId, player1: {}, player2: {}, width:8, height:8 } } componentDidMount() { const { gameId } = this.state; mainService.getGameData(gameId).then((res) => { console.log(res.data); this.setState({ player1: res.data.player1, player2: res.data.player2 }); // -> hier eigenetlich kompleter game }); } renderBoard() { return (
a b c d e f g h
8 ♜ ♞ ♝ ♛ ♚ ♝ ♞ ♜
7 ♟ ♟ ♟ ♟ ♟ ♟ ♟ ♟
6
5
4
3
2 ♙ ♙ ♙ ♙ ♙ ♙ ♙ ♙
1 ♖ ♘ ♗ ♕ ♔ ♗ ♘ ♖
); } renderFieled(x,y){ if(x+y % 2===0){ return (); } return (); } render() { const { inviteLink, player1, player2 } = this.state; return (
{inviteLink}
here is the Game: Player1: {player1 && player1.name} Player2: {player2 && player2.name}
{this.renderBoard()}
) } } export default GameComponent
